Content: President Maithripala Sirisena’s 67th Birthday is tomorrow. Many religious programs have been organized tomorrow in connection with his birthday.President Maithripala Sirisena has been included in the history as the political leader who took a decisive decision in the political history of the country. He was elected to Parliament as Sri Lanka Freedom Party MP for the Polonnaruwa District in 1989 and came a long way as the Deputy Minister of Irrigation, Mahaweli Development Minister and General Secretary of the SLFP. He took oaths as the 6th Executive President of Sri Lanka on 9th January 2015 with a huge public mandate. Many massive programs including the 19th amendment to the constitution, Right to Information Act, Moragahakanda – Kaluganga Development Scheme, ensuring media freedom, Grama Shakthi Development project with the aim of developing rural areas and other public benefit programs have been launched under the leadership of the President. Another significant program of the President is the project to eradicate drugs. President Maithripala Sirisena who was appointed as the Chairman of the 5th Summit of the BIMSTECK state leaders’ conference in Nepal has been able to win over the goodwill of regional state leaders.
